fields.description:
h2. update (1/21/2013)

{{jake app:run}} now uses the new CLI. Below shows a full list of the possible options, all of which are optional. It will build for iphone sim by default:

{code}
jake app:run dir=ui/splitwindow platform=ios tiversion=3.0.0.GA simtype=ipad
{code}

h2. original

The {{jake app:run}} command will use the old titanium.py script. We should convert it to use the new CLI to move forward with it, and aid in testing.
fields.summary: Convert jake app runner to use new CLI
